violation.comment: Guava Cache has concurrency issues around invalidation and ongoing loads. Use EvictableCache, EvictableLoadingCache, or SafeCaches to build caches. See https://github.com/trinodb/trino/issues/10512 for more information and see https://github.com/trinodb/trino/issues/10512#issuecomment-1016221168 for why Caffeine does not solve the problem.
